dcterms:creator: Volkske et al.
dcterms:description: A corpus consisting of approximately 3 million content-summary pairs mined from Reddit, split into training, validation, and test datasets.
dcterms:title: TL;DR Reddit Corpus

dcterms:creator: Hermann et al.
Nallapati et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing pairs of online news articles and their summaries, with approximately 287,000 training pairs, 13,368 validation pairs, and 11,490 testing pairs.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail Corpus
